Source code for src.schemas.company

"""Handle everything related to the request to the company endpoint.
Define the Schemas for the company endpoint.
Export the Schemas.
"""

from typing import Optional

from pydantic import BaseModel



[docs]class Company(BaseModel):
    """class for company schema
    Example:
        >>> Schema(id=1, name="John Doe")
    Args:
        BaseModel (pydantic.BaseModel): pydantic BaseModel
        Config (pydantic.BaseConfig): pydantic BaseConfig

    Attributes:
        id (int): Primary key.
        alerts (int): Alerts.
        currency (str): Currency.
        fiscal_year_start_month (int): Fiscal year start month.
        industry (str): Industry.
        locale (str): Locale.
        move_below_line (int): Move below line.
        name (str): Name.
        start_date (str): Start date.
        accounting_system (str): Accounting system.
        other_accounting_system (str): Other accounting system.

    """

    id: Optional[int]
    alerts: Optional[int]
    currency: Optional[str]
    fiscal_year_start_month: Optional[int]
    industry: Optional[str]
    locale: Optional[str]
    move_below_line: Optional[int]
    name: Optional[str]
    start_date: Optional[str]
    accounting_system: Optional[str]
    other_accounting_system: Optional[str]


[docs]    class Config:
        """class Config for company schema"""

        schema_extra = dict(
            example=dict(
                alerts=1,
                currency="USD",
                fiscal_year_start_month=1,
                industry="Agriculture",
                locale="en",
                move_below_line=1,
                name="John Doe",
                start_date="2020-01-01",
                accounting_system="QuickBooks",
                other_accounting_system="",
            )
        )
        orm_mode = True
